verses.verse: וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> But king שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon אָהַ֞ב <S%H157><s%> loved נָשִׁ֧ים <S%H802><s%> women נָכְרִיּ֛וֹת <S%H5237><s%> strange רַבּ֖וֹת <S%H7227><s%> many וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> together with the daughter פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh מוֹאֲבִיּ֤וֹת <S%H4125><s%> women of the Moabites עַמֳּנִיּוֹת֙ <S%H5984><s%> Ammonites אֲדֹ֣מִיֹּ֔ת <S%H130><s%> Edomites צֵדְנִיֹּ֖ת <S%H6722><s%> Zidonians חִתִּיֹּֽת׃ <S%H2850><s%> [and] Hittites

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> Of the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֩ <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ye shall not go in בָהֶ֗ם וְהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> to these לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> to them neither shall they come in בָכֶ֔ם אָכֵן֙ <S%H403><s%> unto you [for] surely יַטּ֣וּ <S%H5186><s%> they will turn away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבַבְכֶ֔ם <S%H3824><s%> your heart אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their gods בָּהֶ֛ם דָּבַ֥ק <S%H1692><s%> clave שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon לְאַהֲבָֽה׃ <S%H160><s%> love

וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> had ל֣וֹ נָשִׁ֗ים <S%H802><s%> wives שָׂרוֹת֙ <S%H8282><s%> princesses שְׁבַ֣ע <S%H7651><s%> And he had seven מֵא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וּפִֽלַגְשִׁ֖ים <S%H6370><s%> concubines שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three מֵא֑וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַיַּטּ֥וּ <S%H5186><s%> turned away נָשָׁ֖יו <S%H802><s%> and his wives אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3820><s%> his heart

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become לְעֵת֙ <S%H6256><s%> For it came to pass when זִקְנַ֣ת <S%H2209><s%> was old שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon נָשָׁיו֙ <S%H802><s%> [that] his wives הִטּ֣וּ <S%H5186><s%> turned away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבָב֔וֹ <S%H3824><s%> his heart אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> other וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְבָב֤וֹ <S%H3824><s%> and his heart שָׁלֵם֙ <S%H8003><s%> was not perfect עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> with the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔יו <S%H430><s%> his God כִּלְבַ֖ב <S%H3824><s%> as [was] the heart דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> For Solomon אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after עַשְׁתֹּ֔רֶת <S%H6253><s%> Ashtoreth אֱלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> the goddess צִדֹנִ֑ים <S%H6722><s%> of the Zidonians וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> and after מִלְכֹּ֔ם <S%H4445><s%> Milcom שִׁקֻּ֖ץ <S%H8251><s%> the abomination עַמֹּנִֽים׃ <S%H5984><s%> of the Ammonites

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not מִלֵּ֛א <S%H4390><s%> and went not fully אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כְּדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> as [did] David אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father ס

אָז֩ <S%H227><s%> Then יִבְנֶ֨ה <S%H1129><s%> build שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <S%H8010><s%> Then did Solomon בָּמָ֗ה <S%H1116><s%> an high place לִכְמוֹשׁ֙ <S%H3645><s%> for Chemosh שִׁקֻּ֣ץ <S%H8251><s%> the abomination מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab בָּהָ֕ר <S%H2022><s%> in the hill אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> that [is] before יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem וּלְמֹ֕לֶךְ <S%H4432><s%> and for Molech שִׁקֻּ֖ץ <S%H8251><s%> the abomination בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> And likewise did לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all נָשָׁ֖יו <S%H802><s%> wives הַנָּכְרִיּ֑וֹת <S%H5237><s%> he for all his strange מַקְטִיר֥וֹת <S%H6999><s%> which burnt incense וּֽמְזַבְּח֖וֹת <S%H2076><s%> and sacrificed לֵאלֹהֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H430><s%> unto their gods

וַיִּתְאַנַּ֥ף <S%H599><s%> was angry יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בִּשְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> with Solomon כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because נָטָ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> was turned לְבָב֗וֹ <S%H3824><s%> because his heart מֵעִ֤ם <S%H5973><s%> from יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַנִּרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> which had appeared אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to him פַּעֲמָֽיִם׃ <S%H6471><s%> unto him twice

וְצִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> And had commanded אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> him concerning this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this לְבִ֨לְתִּי־ <S%H1115><s%> should not לֶ֔כֶת <S%H1980><s%> go אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> other וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֔ר <S%H8104><s%> but he kept אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what צִוָּ֖ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> not that which the LORD פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Wherefore the LORD לִשְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> unto Solomon יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָֽיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> become זֹּ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> Forasmuch as this is done of thee and thou hast not kept בְּרִיתִ֣י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant וְחֻקֹּתַ֔י <S%H2708><s%> and my statutes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֖יתִי <S%H6680><s%> which I have commanded עָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and קָרֹ֨עַ <S%H7167><s%> thee I will surely אֶקְרַ֤ע <S%H7167><s%> rend אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּמְלָכָה֙ <S%H4467><s%> the kingdom מֵֽעָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and וּנְתַתִּ֖יהָ <S%H5414><s%> from thee and will give לְעַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> it to thy servant

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Nevertheless בְּיָמֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H3117><s%> Notwithstanding in thy days לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶעֱשֶׂ֔נָּה <S%H6213><s%> I will not do לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> the sake דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> it for David אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father's מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> it out of the hand בִּנְךָ֖ <S%H1121><s%> of thy son אֶקְרָעֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7167><s%> sake [but] I will rend

רַ֤ק <S%H7535><s%> Howbeit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמַּמְלָכָה֙ <S%H4467><s%> all the kingdom לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶקְרָ֔ע <S%H7167><s%> I will not rend away שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> tribe אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> one אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> [but] will give לִבְנֶ֑ךָ <S%H1121><s%> to thy son לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> the sake דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> for David עַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5650><s%> my servant's וּלְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> the sake יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> sake and for Jerusalem's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּחָֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H977><s%> sake which I have chosen

וַיָּ֨קֶם <S%H6965><s%> stirred up יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD שָׂטָן֙ <S%H7854><s%> an adversary לִשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> unto Solomon אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הֲדַ֣ד <S%H1908><s%> Hadad הָאֲדֹמִ֑י <S%H130><s%> the Edomite מִזֶּ֧רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> he [was] of the king's ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בֶּאֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> in Edom

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בִּֽהְי֤וֹת <S%H1961><s%> came דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> For it came to pass when David אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> was in אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> was in Edom בַּעֲל֗וֹת <S%H5927><s%> was gone up יוֹאָב֙ <S%H3097><s%> and Joab שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> the captain הַצָּבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> of the host לְקַבֵּ֖ר <S%H6912><s%> to bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲלָלִ֑ים <S%H2491><s%> the slain וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> after he had smitten כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> every male בֶּאֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> in Edom

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שֵׁ֧שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> (For six חֳדָשִׁ֛ים <S%H2320><s%> months יָֽשַׁב־ <S%H3427><s%> remain שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there יוֹאָ֖ב <S%H3097><s%> did Joab וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> there with all Israel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הִכְרִ֥ית <S%H3772><s%> until he had cut off כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> every male בֶּאֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> Edom

וַיִּבְרַ֣ח <S%H1272><s%> fled אֲדַ֡ד <S%H1908><s%> Hadad הוּא֩ <S%H1931><s%> he וַאֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H376><s%> and certain אֲדֹמִיִּ֜ים <S%H130><s%> Edomites מֵעַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> servants אָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> of his father's אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> for לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> with him to go מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וַהֲדַ֖ד <S%H1908><s%> Hadad נַ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> child קָטָֽן׃ <S%H6996><s%> [being] yet a little

וַיָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> And they arose מִמִּדְיָ֔ן <S%H4080><s%> out of Midian וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came פָּארָ֑ן <S%H6290><s%> to Paran וַיִּקְחוּ֩ <S%H3947><s%> and they took אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H582><s%> men עִמָּ֜ם <S%H5973><s%> from מִפָּארָ֗ן <S%H6290><s%> with them out of Paran וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they came מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> to Egypt אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֣ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> which gave ל֣וֹ בַ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> him an house וְלֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> him victuals אָ֣מַר <S%H559><s%> and appointed ל֔וֹ וְאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> him land נָ֥תַן <S%H5414><s%> and gave לֽוֹ׃

וַיִּמְצָא֙ <S%H4672><s%> found הֲדַ֥ד <S%H1908><s%> And Hadad חֵ֛ן <S%H2580><s%> favour בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight פַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> great וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> so that he gave ל֤וֹ אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> him to wife אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲח֣וֹת <S%H269><s%> the sister אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> of his own wife אֲח֖וֹת <S%H269><s%> the sister תַּחְפְּנֵ֥יס <S%H8472><s%> of Tahpenes הַגְּבִירָֽה׃ <S%H1377><s%> the queen
